Document types for Papers

Alfonso R. Reyes

2019-01-10

Source: vignettes/document_types_of_papers.Rmd
document_types_of_papers.Rmd

When a query is returned by OnePetro inside the web page with the results also comes the dc_type or document type for all the papers that returned from that search.

The type of papers are:

  • Conference paper
  • Journal paper
  • General
  • Media
  • Presentation
  • Other

If we want to know what type of papers are available for a particular search we follow these steps:

Create a query

Our search is for the exact words “well test”. How many papers return from that search?

library(petro.One)

my_url <- make_search_url(query = "well test", 
                          how = "all")          # exact match

get_papers_count(my_url)
## [1] 12877

Find the type of papers available

sdc <- papers_by_type(my_url)
sdc
## # A tibble: 7 x 2
##   name             value
##   <chr>            <dbl>
## 1 Chapter              8
## 2 Conference paper 10002
## 3 General            194
## 4 Journal paper     2619
## 5 Media                9
## 6 Other                8
## 7 Presentation        37

We see that the most numerous category is conference papers followed by journal. The total number of papers is about 12877

Variable type of documents

Depending of the words we are searching, the document types that return from the search may not be the same in all cases. For instance, in this case, we don’t get the type for Other or Chapter.

library(petro.One)

my_url <- make_search_url(query = "smart completion", 
                          how = "all")          # exact match

sdc    <- papers_by_type(my_url)
sdc
## # A tibble: 5 x 2
##   name             value
##   <chr>            <dbl>
## 1 Conference paper   404
## 2 General              1
## 3 Journal paper       41
## 4 Media                1
## 5 Presentation         3

Get a list of papers for specific type.

All types for deepwater 

library(petro.One)

my_url <- make_search_url(query = "deepwater")

sdc    <- papers_by_type(my_url)
sdc
## # A tibble: 7 x 2
##   name             value
##   <chr>            <dbl>
## 1 Chapter              3
## 2 Conference paper 14175
## 3 General             45
## 4 Journal paper     2587
## 5 Media               73
## 6 Other               12
## 7 Presentation       514

Chapter papers for deepwater 

my_url <- make_search_url(query = "deepwater", 
                          dc_type = "chapter")

onepetro_page_to_dataframe(my_url)
## # A tibble: 3 x 6
##   book_title             paper_id dc_type authors               year source
##   <fct>                  <fct>    <fct>   <chr>                <int> <fct> 
## 1 Offshore Operations (~ peh      chapter Silcox, William H.,~  1987 SPE   
## 2 Development Plan for ~ peh      chapter Poston, Steven W., ~  1987 SPE   
## 3 Properties of Produce~ peh      chapter Collins, A. Gene, U~  1987 SPE

Journal papers for deepwater 

my_url <- make_search_url(query = "deepwater", 
                          dc_type = "journal-paper")

onepetro_page_to_dataframe(my_url)
## # A tibble: 10 x 6
##    book_title        paper_id   dc_type  authors                year source
##    <fct>             <fct>      <fct>    <chr>                 <int> <fct> 
##  1 Deepwater Operat~ SPE-0113-~ journal~ Eaton, Luke, ConocoP~  2013 SPE   
##  2 Deepwater Projec~ SPE-0516-~ journal~ Iversen, Morten, BG    2016 SPE   
##  3 Deepwater Fans    SPE-15776~ journal~ Richardson, J.G., Ri~  1987 SPE   
##  4 Advancing Deepwa~ SPE-0516-~ journal~ Carpenter, Chris, JP~  2016 SPE   
##  5 Deepwater-Riser ~ SPE-0499-~ journal~ Denney, Dennis, JPT ~  1999 SPE   
##  6 Deepwater Drilli~ SPE-13479~ journal~ Chastain, T., Hughes~  1986 SPE   
##  7 Comments: Deepwa~ SPE-1006-~ journal~ Donnelly, John, JPT ~  2006 SPE   
##  8 Technology Focus~ SPE-0517-~ journal~ Iversen, Morten, Kar~  2017 SPE   
##  9 Evaluating Deepw~ SPE-28679~ journal~ Abbott, P.A., Aker O~  1995 SPE   
## 10 Achieving Deepwa~ SPE-0513-~ journal~ Pai, Satish, Schlumb~  2013 SPE

General papers for deepwater 

my_url <- make_search_url(query = "deepwater", 
                          dc_type = "general")

onepetro_page_to_dataframe(my_url)
## # A tibble: 10 x 6
##    book_title               paper_id  dc_type authors           year source
##    <fct>                    <fct>     <fct>   <chr>            <int> <fct> 
##  1 Stability Of Deepwater ~ SPE-1124~ general Sunde, Rolf M.,~  1982 SPE   
##  2 Risers: A Key Challenge~ SPE-1087~ general Cook, Howard, B~  2005 SPE   
##  3 Fluid Selection for Dee~ SPE-1087~ general Ali, Syed A., C~  2005 SPE

##  5 Data Visualization Cent~ SPE-5683~ general Bowering, Dale,~  1999 SPE

## 10 Gas Hydrates: Friend or~ SPE-1088~ general Tohidi, Bahman,~  2005 SPE

Presentation papers for deepwater 

my_url <- make_search_url(query = "deepwater", 
                          dc_type = "presentation")

onepetro_page_to_dataframe(my_url)
## # A tibble: 10 x 6
##    book_title            paper_id  dc_type  authors             year source
##    <fct>                 <fct>     <fct>    <chr>              <int> <fct> 
##  1 Video:              ~ SPE-1679~ present~ Johnson, Austin, ~  2014 SPE   
##  2 Video:              ~ OTC-2513~ present~ Dekker, Martijn, ~  2014 OTC

##  8 Video:              ~ OTC-2604~ present~ Gutierrez, Jose A~  2015 OTC
